creator: oliver.siegmar@xams.org
text:
I'm using the DailyRollingFileAppender of log4j 1.2.15 with a DatePattern set to
'.'yyyy-ww

I noticed that the last week log file of 2007 .2007-52 is followed by a .2007-01
instead of a 2008-01. I guess this is because Dec. 30/31 2007 (depending on the
first day of the week) is in week 1 but this behaviour is very misleading.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
This is a manifestation of the documented behavior of java.util.SimpleDateFormat,  
Seehttp://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=4267450.  If and when SimpleDateFormat 
has additional specifiers that allow the expected behavior, DailyRollingFileAppender should support them.
